[id='creating-integrations']
= Creating integrations

After some planning and preparation, you are ready to create an
integration. In the {prodname} web interface, when you
click *Create Integration*, {prodname} guides you
through the procedure to create an integration.

It is assumed that you are familiar with the information in these topics:

* <<planning>>
* <<workflow-overview>>

The following topics provide information and instructions for creating
an integration:

* <<preparing-to-create-an-integration>>
* <<procedure-for-creating-an-integration>>
* <<add-steps>>

include::preparing_to_create_an_integration.adoc[leveloffset=+1]

include::procedure_for_creating_an_integration.adoc[leveloffset=+1]

include::add_steps.adoc[leveloffset=+1]
